text.en_US: A peculiar slime-based lass engineered by the Ancients for the purpose of managing the power of the Track. Having been recently taken in by the visionaries of \c[3]Facility X\c[0] over at \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0], she's taken quite the liking to a cutting-edge art project the Facility has been developing for a while. By conjuring the likenesses of her fellow Facility residents onto the Reality Canvas she transports around, her paint creations become fully functional paint clones of her actual friends! This happens to be a pretty convenient way of building up firepower, as you may have noticed in the fight with her.
